name: Space Wrangler (itch)
description:
Gitty-up up fer a dang'on frolic on yer space farm! 

It's meteor-mutt season and ye got yer livestock to protect, with the trustiest of pardners: a rope looped around itself.

Scoot around and lasso them varmints! Set up rope fences and make yer way home on the range until ye can hit the hay.

Controls

WASD - Movement  
Mouse - Aim  
Left Mouse Button - Wind up and Throw Lasso  
Right Mouse Button - Place Stake  

Credits

Programming: @ambadev (Twitter , Twitch)

Character Design and Illustration: @ramememe (Twitter , Twitch )

UI Design, Tile Design, Music, and Sound Effects: @mallow-ch (Twitter,Twitch)

Character Sprites, Animation, and Level Design: @j-loy (Twitter)
